text: Penicillium paxilli is an anamorph, saprophytic species of the genus Penicillium which produces paxilline, paxisterol, penicillone, pyrenocine A, paspaline B and verruculogene.UniProtATCC Penicillium paxilli is used as a model to study the biochemistry of the indol-diterepene biosysnthesis == Further reading == * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * == References == paxilli Category:Fungi described in 1907
title: Penicillium paxilli
